mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.project_no AS "projectNo", a.project_name AS "projectName", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.status AS "status", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.longitude AS "longitude", a.latitude AS "latitude", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.login_name AS "loginName", a.customer_type AS "customerType", a.version AS "version", a.project_all_name AS "projectAllName", a.customer AS "customer", a.customer_phone AS "customerPhone", a.business AS "business", a.business_phone AS "businessPhone", a.contract_no AS "contractNo", office.name AS "office.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office office ON office.id = a.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_info( id, project_no, project_name, office_id, status, longitude, latitude, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, login_name, customer_type, version, project_all_name, customer, customer_phone, business, business_phone, contract_no, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{projectNo}, #{projectName}, #{office.id}, #{status}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{loginName}, #{customerType}, #{version}, #{projectAllName}, #{customer}, #{customerPhone}, #{business}, #{businessPhone}, #{contractNo}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE project_info SET project_no = #{projectNo}, project_name = #{projectName}, office_id = #{office.id}, status = #{status}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, remarks = #{remarks}, login_name = #{loginName}, customer_type = #{customerType}, version = #{version}, project_all_name = #{projectAllName}, customer = #{customer}, customer_phone = #{customerPhone}, business = #{business}, business_phone = #{businessPhone}, contract_no = #{contractNo}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.* FROM project_info a where ${propertyName} = '${value}'
